subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: First it was Lionel Messi. Then Ronaldinho. Now, perhaps, Samuel Eto’o. All three play for Barcelona, and all three hope to represent their countries at the Olympics next month in Beijing.
snippet: First it was Lionel Messi. Then Ronaldinho. Now, perhaps, Samuel Eto’o. All three play for Barcelona, and all three hope to represent their countries at the Olympics next month in Beijing.
